main event: A college student observed an unidentified flying object in Easthampton, New York on June 22, 1966.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 5-7 seconds., The object was described as exceedingly round and larger than a pinhead., It appeared to be white and was blinking on and off., The sighting occurred on a clear night, about 15 feet away from the observer's residence., The student reported that the UFO passed close to what he thought was an airline aircraft, leading him to believe a collision was imminent.
witness description: 19 year old college student, serious and well spoken
